title: Title
chatbot-welcome-message: Hello! How can I assist you today?
chatbot-question-list-intro: Here are some questions you can ask me:
chatbot-answer-intro: Here is the information you requested:

chatbot-goodbye: Thank you for chatting with us! Have a great day.
